attributes.review: This app literally made me turn pink with furry when my mother said I couldn’t eat the family birds anymore and then the my family decided I wasn’t the best for them so they decided to return me to the adoption agency but now the adoption agency refuses to accept me due to my stench so I have to live with my homie Fredríc and the hairless cat named alebithiaclitus behind the trash bins. So thanks to this app I now am homeless and my homie/soon to be husband might have aids. AND alebithiaclitus is saying that they (they are gender non conforming) are moving out and finding a better dumpster and a better street couple than me and fredríc. and all this for an app? Discrimination.
attributes.title: oyorfoedpwspqsed

attributes.review: This app did not satisfy me at all. All I wanted to do was support my Cheeto looking president, but it took 365 days for the app to download. As soon as I was able to open the app, I was immediately hacked. If my cheeto looking president were to pay less attention to TikTok and more attention to his app I don’t think there would be any problems.
attributes.title: yeah no❤️

attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE. The people may say it’s horrendous. To the people of this country. Many people think this app shouldn’t be available for download on the App Store. The people shouldn’t have it. We hate this app quite frankly it’s a terrible app.

attributes.review: I would give it less than 1 star if i could. It seems to condone white supremacy which is strange for an app. Overall terrible experience 0/5 stars.
